welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sahuarita, a charming city known for its beautiful desert landscape and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the unique sights and experiences our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tucson International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is primarily used for regional flights and serves as a secondary terminal at Tucson International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'TUS Free WiFi' from their device's network list.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Davis Monthan AFB Airport serves all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Davis Monthan AFB Airport serves all military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
